name: Rationale Coffee
paragraph: Coffee Roasters is an italian micro roastery and a retail. Specialty coffee market is growing significantly in Italy. And even though Italy invented the word barista,the quality of roasting and the ways how coffee is served and prepared are too low. The request was to codify and visualize the idea of the perfect coffee, the right preparation and the required knowledge to enjoy it.

name: Roche
paragraph: For the #NuovaLuceSullaSM campaign, we teamed up with ANTIMATERIA to create an immersive video and sound installation, composed of 4 light beams in order to make visible the voices and feelings of patients. I designed and animated the video case of this event.

name: Sidequest
paragraph: The request was to recreate the world of Sidequest, absorbed by his own room, a musical producer who loves videogames and being a teenager.
